attributes.description: The CX5 is the bestselling car in the Mazda range and the Dynamic Auto is the middle of the range in the 2.0 litre engine. The CX5 Dynamic Auto offers a very good value proposition and spec level, which includes a Full leather interior, electric drivers seat, smart advanced keyless access, auto fold mirrors, auto lights and wipers, Apple Car Play/Android Auto and Bluetooth, reverse camera, 17 wheel and tyre combo, driveway lock, cruise control and dual zone climate control which blows through to the rear. The CX5 comes with a 3 year unlimited mileage service plan and warranty, with the option of extending and roadside assistance for 3 years.
